content: *pattern is only available from web archive org* this pattern page is a part of the crochet for every room collection this one is in the bathroom section get that spa feeling with crochet materials **bernat handicrafter 50 g/1 75 oz ** main color mc 13007 ivory face cloth 3 balls towel 4 balls contrast a 13215 robin s egg face cloth 1 ball towel 1 ball or **lily sugar n cream 70 9 g/2 5 oz ** main color mc 01004 soft ecru face cloth 2 balls towel 3 balls contrast a 01215 robin s egg face cloth 1 ball towel 1 ball size 5 mm u s h or 8 crochet hook
